metadata.name: 01.19.2022 | heartcode #1
metadata.description:
sound & visual by freedoom  
words by karsen daily  
_________________

01.19.2022

i’d never know it if i heard it 
but i listen for your scream when it’s quiet in my head 
paralyzed by emptiness that isn’t my own  
haunted by the same ghost  
gasping at your demons appearing in my nightmares

trying to hold you is like embracing the air  
abysmally empty yet vitally necessary

there’s no mediation or conversation  
in a room shared with grief  
i guess that’s what they mean by 
three’s company  
reap what you sow but what was reaped stunted our growth  
laying on the grave of a man i’ll never know

mourning love ungroomed  
pruning a garden of flowers unbloomed

reminders of life not lived  
fights unforgiven  
amends not given  
roads untraveled; not even “one less taken”

whatever is gone is hopelessly gone  
whatever is new may never stick

the time we spent walking  
was destined to end  
forever falling 
off the cliffs of dread
